title: Stayer Cycles OG Plus Monstercross
content:
The Stayer OG Plus is a frame to take advantage of the mullet, mix and match, mountain bike drive chain, and road bike shifter component options that make bikes like this sort of a strange bird. Monstercross? Adventure bike? Or just a touring bike? Whatever you call it, the OG Plus has a phenotype we can all get behind.

 

At a glance features:

  • Custom size and geo, if required, at no extra cost. Just upload your fit data when paying your deposit.
  • Optional internal DT routing at no extra cost.
  • 44mm ID straight headtube for tapered steerer or ENVE InRoute system.
  • OGPlus stainless 3d printed yoke for 2.4″ clearance with 40t chainring.
  • Hulsroy designed modular stainless 3d printed C40 style or hooded UDH dropout options.

Custom or ‘off the peg’ geo and wheel size options, all with tire clearance for 2.4” tires. As a customer, you can choose between internal or external downtube cable routing, and all frames are now updated and super slick yoke and dropout design from the mighty Hulsroy.

A big heap of frames from a small bike workshop in East London, handmade to order for you by folks who know their stuff.

Spring24 BATCH total price – £2200 (out of batch price £2500)

Orders made before the end of Feb 2024 or before the maximum batch number of 12 is exceeded will be included in the Spring24 batch. Everything thereafter will be added to our custom order list at out-of-batch pricing.

Choose your frame size – either one of our ‘off the peg’ sizes or choose Custom size if you have bike fit info to send. Then choose dropout and brake routing options and finish. If there is any current stock it will be listed on the frame stock page and available to purchase from there. With this form you are ordering a custom frame only built to order as part of the Spring24 OGPlus batch.

Specs and options:

  • Custom frame sizing and Geo available at no extra cost
  • 27.5 or 29er ‘off the peg’ geo options or choose custom and say what you want
  • TIG-Welded main frame construction using Columbus Zona and T45 tubing
  • Stainless steel dropouts – either our own Hulsroy designed flat mount modular C40’s or UDH specific hooded
  • Flat mount rear brake mount (max 160mm)
  • Seat tube internal diameter for 27.2mm seatpost as standard and others on request
  • 44mm ID headtube
  • T47 bottom bracket shell
  • Internal or external routing option
  • 3D printed Hulsroy Yoke for 2.4″ tyre clearance and either road or MTB drivechain
  • Choose from house finishes or go custom

 

Check out more at Stayer Cycles!
